page.title: 07Transport in Wembley
page.content:
In our block we have 3 major forms of transport.They are:-
WATER : The{Grand Union Canal {} At one time this would have been used as a major route for the carrying of goods between{central London}and Birmingham. Nowadays the canal is used mainly by fishermen,pleasure boats and walkers. In some places the local Council has cleared and repaired the towpath to make a "Canal Side Walk".
RAILWAY :{London}to the{North
This is the main line from Euston to Glasgow.It is a very important and busy route.Under a local footbridge there are nearly 20 tracks ! (cont. on page 8)
